1.title: Oh My Swirls

episode of.title: The Dream of Epicness: The Series (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Hello everyone and welcome to a brand new series called the Dream Of Epicness. In this series we have to adventure with a person named The Dream Fairy. We have to complete a quest before we awake from this dream known as the Dream Of Epicness. Enjoy everyone.

imdb.plot outline: When Bob the builder sleeps one night, he lands in a Dream called the Dream of Epicness. He is guided by the Dream Fairy and the owner of the dream known as Dave the Dream Keeper. Bob meets new people throughout this series like a robot, a brother of a robot and many more. The way to get out of the dream is too stop the Zombinomicon and get out of the dream. Will bob make it out of the dream and will he stop the Zombinomicon once and for all? Find out in this brand new exciting series of The Dream of Epicness.
imdb.title: The Dream of Epicness: The Series
akas: The Dream of Epicness: The Series (United States)
plot: When Bob the builder sleeps one night, he lands in a Dream called the Dream of Epicness. He is guided by the Dream Fairy and the owner of the dream known as Dave the Dream Keeper. Bob meets new people throughout this series like a robot, a brother of a robot and many more. The way to get out of the dream is too stop the Zombinomicon and get out of the dream. Will bob make it out of the dream and will he stop the Zombinomicon once and for all? Find out in this brand new exciting series of The Dream of Epicness.::Adrian Ryden
